rows.label: tev018201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Cedric about the hangars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Cedric if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Cedric for his thoughts on the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Cedric about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Cedric about the restricted hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Cedric about the restricted hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Cedric about the Skells in the hangars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Cedric about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Cedric about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0001
rows.name:
These are facilities for storing and maintaining Skells
and other vehicles used by BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0002
rows.name:
If the world outside of New LA is BLADE's battlefield,
these hangars are where we mechanics go to war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0003
rows.name:
And for the sake of humanity, we will fight to fix
every last Skell, no matter how severe the damage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0010
rows.name:
A BLADE from the Outfitters division went to Noctilum
to field test a new weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I haven't heard anything since,
and now I'm starting to get worried.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Byron and I made sure his Skell was in tip-top shape
before he deployed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Of course, since it was using experimental weaponry,
there's just no way to predict what might have gone
wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0018
rows.name:
A repair job that typically takes us three days,
they can get done in just a few hours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0019
rows.name:
But some days they just don't feel like working,
so they cut out early to get a pie at Army Pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Working with them has its pluses and minuses,
but when you add everything up, it still works out
to a great big plus for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'm sure glad that we were able to forge a pact of
friendship with such promising allies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0026
rows.name: Well, a lot of Skells got destroyed by the Ganglion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0027
rows.name:
But I don't want you BLADEs to worry about that.
Just please keep exploring Mira like normal, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0028
rows.name:
This is a battle for us mechanics to fight,
and you better believe we're gonna win it.
We'll fix up every last thing they destroyed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0032
rows.name:
Commander Vandham brought some BLADEs in there,
and he had a pretty intense look on his face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0033
rows.name: Whatever it was, it's a pretty big deal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0034
rows.name: You should go help them out if you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0039
rows.name:
There are all sorts of other valuable prototypes in there,
so we couldn't just leave it wide open.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0040
rows.name:
That's why all us mechanics got together and repaired
the broken restricted-hangar door.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0041
rows.name:
But I guess when there's a traitor, it doesn't matter how
sturdy the door isâ€”it ain't protecting a damn thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0046
rows.name:
That new device has revolutionized the Skell business
overnight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0047
rows.name:
We're installing Skell flight modules as fast as we
possibly can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0048
rows.name:
Since they're so new to us, these module-equipped
Skells take significantly longer to maintain than the
flightless kind did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0049
rows.name:
Thankfully, there aren't too many BLADEs who have
them yet, so we have a little time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG0050
rows.name:
But we're going to learn everything about them as fast
as we possibly can, and make sure Lin's hard work
doesn't go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG1001
rows.name:
The Outfitter who went missing in Noctilum made it
back to New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG1002
rows.name:
His Skell was destroyed by an indigen,
so he was just trying to survive out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG1003
rows.name:
Luckily, a BLADE named [ST:playername ]
found and rescued him. Oh, and I guess [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] got
the test data, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG1004
rows.name:
Can you believe the luck of being stranded in a place
like that and just happening across such a kind BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG2001
rows.name:
This Skell just stopped moving the other day,
so Byron and I have been trying to figure out why.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG2002
rows.name: We tried and tried, but we just couldn't understand it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG2003
rows.name:
Right then, Commander Vandham came by to see how
we were doing. He took one look at that Skell and
said, "It's got a short in its chest piece."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG2004
rows.name:
He told us to replace the Number 320 cable.
Soon as we did? Boom! Thing was moving again.
I couldn't believe it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018201_MSG2005
rows.name:
But I guess that's what I should expect from the man
who served as the White Whale's chief engineer and
also spearheaded the construction of New LA.[ST:wait ]
